name: AI Assistant for Home Assistant
description: AI-powered smart home assistant with Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini and GitHub Models (30+ AI models)

ai_provider.name: AI Provider
ai_provider.description: Select your AI provider (Anthropic Claude, OpenAI, Google Gemini, or GitHub Models)

anthropic_api_key.name: Anthropic API Key
anthropic_api_key.description: API key from console.anthropic.com (required if provider=anthropic)

openai_api_key.name: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.description: API key from platform.openai.com (required if provider=openai)

google_api_key.name: Google API Key
google_api_key.description: API key from aistudio.google.com (required if provider=google)

github_token.name: GitHub Token
github_token.description: Personal Access Token from github.com/settings/tokens (required if provider=github)

github_model.name: GitHub Model
github_model.description: Select AI model when using GitHub Models provider (37+ models available)

api_port.name: API Port
api_port.description: Internal API port (default: 5000, advanced users only)

debug_mode.name: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting (creates larger logs)

enable_file_access.name: Enable File Access
enable_file_access.description: Allow AI to read/write Home Assistant config files (automations, scripts, YAML). Required for advanced file operations.

language.name: Language
language.description: AI response language: English, Italian, Spanish, or French

timeout.name: Request Timeout
timeout.description: API request timeout in seconds (default: 30, increase if responses are slow)

max_retries.name: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum retry attempts for failed API calls (default: 3)
